english.segment1: Wait. Wait, I can hardly wait. To look into Your face. When the world disappears into Your eyes
english.segment2: Wait, I can hardly wait. To hear your sweet voice say. You've done well, my good and faithful son
english.segment3: Breathe, I can hardly breathe. In anticipation. Waithing for the day to come. When You will shine on me
english.segment4: Wait, I can hardly wait. To bow at Your feet. Kiss the scars that bore my sins away. I can hardly breathe In anticipation. Waiting for the day to come. When You will shine on me
